headline: Graduate Student at Illinois Institute of Technology | MS ITM | Machine Learning Enthusiast | Ex- Cognizant | HTML | CSS | JavaScript | Core Java | SQL | Websphere MQ | IBM - ACE
summary:
As a Programmer Analyst with a background in mechanical engineering, I bring a unique perspective to software development. With skills in HTML, CSS, JS, SQL, Core Java, IBM ACE, and MQ, I have a solid foundation in programming and technology. I am currently expanding my expertise in ML and data science, and I am eager to apply these skills to real-world challenges.

In addition to my professional work, I am passionate about giving back to my community. I have volunteered with Make A Difference as an Academic Support Volunteer and Shelter Support Fellow, helping students to achieve their academic goals and prepare for exams.

I am always looking for new opportunities to grow and learn, and I am open to connecting with other professionals in the industry. If you are interested in discussing potential collaborations or opportunities, please feel free to reach out.

Thank you for taking the time to read my profile summary, and I look forward to connecting with you!

experiences.title: Programmer Analyst
experiences.description: Successfully designed and implemented a comprehensive messaging infrastructure using IBM ACE and IBM MQ, optimizing data flow and communication across heterogeneous systems. Achieved significant gains in operational efficiency, ensuring message reliability and security. Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to deliver a scalable and high-performance solution, resulting in streamlined business processes and improved customer experiences.

experiences.title: Programmer Analyst Trainee
experiences.description: Orchestrated a digital transformation initiative, integrating SharePoint and Microsoft Power Apps to streamline workflows and enhance collaboration. Migrated legacy systems to SharePoint, establishing a centralized content repository. Developed custom Power Apps for workflow automation, resulting in significant time and cost savings. Achieved improved data accessibility and real-time reporting for enhanced operational efficiency.

volunteer_work.title: Academic Support Volunteer
volunteer_work.description:
Physics tutor for class 9 students, where I designed and tailored effective lesson plans and helped them 
achieve good grades by conducting proper tests and giving constructive feedback.

Adaptably participated and hosted several events across the city through the organization, creating
awareness and making a significant impact on a large scale.

volunteer_work.title: Shelter Support Fellow
volunteer_work.description:
In this fellowship role, I established proper connection between shelter homes and NGO, facilitating 
academic success for numerous children, enabling them to attain commendable grades in their examinations. 

Played an integral role in community projects, including fundraising initiatives and awareness campaigns, contributing to the holistic development of the children in shelter homes.

Sourcing, Recruiting, On-boarding, Volunteer Management and engagement and all city event mobilization. Collaborated closely with key stakeholders within the organization, demonstrating 
effective management skills.
